name: Squid
desc: Caching proxy for the Web supporting HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, and more

options.name: configText
options.desc: Verbatim contents of squid.conf. If null (default), use theautogenerated file from NixOS instead.

options.name: enable
options.desc: Whether to run squid web proxy.

options.name: extraConfig
options.desc: Squid configuration. Contents will be added verbatim to theconfiguration file.

options.name: proxyAddress
options.desc: IP address on which squid will listen.

options.name: proxyPort
options.desc: TCP port on which squid will listen.
